author: James Tanner
method: Heat the oil in a saucepan over a medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and fry for 3-4 minutes, until softened. Add the frozen peas and chicken stock and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for ten minutes. Add the cream and use a hand blender to liquidise the soup. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and serve in a warm bowl, garnished with a mint leaf.
